name: Dinner at Fazbear's
description:
(DISCLAIMER: This game contains jumpscares and does not save data.)

Dinner at Fazbear's is a FNaF fangame made in three days. (Most characters and artwork are owned by Scott Cawthon.)

In Dinner at Fazbear's, you are the manager of one of the many Freddy Fazbear's Pizza locations. But since you are so poor, you can't hire a nightguard.

Download it on Gamejolt

Original Release Date: Jul 15, 2020
